Articles.Content:
Dreks are like Colossi, slow as hell and stuck in a small area but for the love of everything don't let it get too close.

Edited October 14, 2014 by Spartwo
Welp, 0.25 broke half of my designs. I'll be back with an updated catalog soon, plus a few new ones based on the new parts.

Lol the Dreks greatest weakness.

Its a gas guzzling tank

true that... but it's so cool!

Why do I feel like I'm the only one who gets that reference?

I FEEL THE G-FORCE. IT IS A GOOD PULL.

You're not the only one.

oh dear The old rivalry begins again...

(BTW i don't know what side i should be on, I need a side with lots of fuel opportunities for the Drek)

I'd say pick HKA, since my company (the MU) is allied with them, and they do a ton of Kethane mining and refining, whilst GMI just seems to act like imperialist jerks 24/7.

I'd say pick HKA, since my company (the MU) is allied with them, and they do a ton of Kethane mining and refining, whilst GMI just seems to act like imperialist jerks 24/7.

Ha ha, GMI may be jerks at the moment but they've got some very interesting business coming up in season 2. Place your bets carefully gentlemen (c'mon Zekes, GMI is best GMI).

I'd say pick HKA, since my company (the MU) is allied with them, and they do a ton of Kethane mining and refining, whilst GMI just seems to act like imperialist jerks 24/7.

but at the same time GMI does need allies for the story sake. Plus as stated before, Dreks just look like GMI ships

Also zeke have your considered making a corvette or frigate version of the Drek out of wing parts

Sacrifice armor for TWR
I really have no Idea where you're going with season 2. It seems like everything will boil down to the next episode.

Ha ha, GMI may be jerks at the moment but they've got some very interesting business coming up in season 2. Place your bets carefully gentlemen (c'mon Zekes, GMI is best GMI).

Well, The Drek is definitely a game-changer on either side, so I have to decide where I want my weight to be...

but at the same time GMI does need allies for the story sake. Plus as stated before, Dreks just look like GMI ships

Also zeke have your considered making a corvette or frigate version of the Drek out of wing parts

Sacrifice armor for TWR

I have, the drekevak 15, it's only like 50 tonnes, carries 2 missiles. I should make a new one though

Ha ha, GMI may be jerks at the moment but they've got some very interesting business coming up in season 2. Place your bets carefully gentlemen (c'mon Zekes, GMI is best GMI).

Now you got me nervous sense my fleets are defense forces and promote peace.

but HKA was attacked first

Well, The Drek is definitely a game-changer on either side, so I have to decide where I want my weight to be... i want to side with the "good guys" a bit though, ZS is always on the side of order and good.

Hehe. I'd update the destroyer, but the Arrow missiles are progressing along too nicely.

I'm staying in and around Kerbin for now.
Fine, I'm on GMI's side. Let's see how this turns out. But i better not be left hanging with no fuel...
Remember that there's two sides to every story. Spiritwolf attacked first after all.

Fine, I'm on GMI's side. Let's see how this turns out. But i better not be left hanging with no fuel...

Sh*t, I just realized I'm going to have to fight the drek now... I really do need to get SK's new heavy into the series.

Remember that there's two sides to every story. Spiritwolf attacked first after all.

Aww but they were being spied on and the Vulture was a trader to SW

Sh*t, I just realized I'm going to have to fight the drek now... I really do need to get SK's new heavy into the series.

Don't forget i ll be (re)posting my ships hopefully soon

You have me to fall back on now. I will begin mass production of what ever the hell I have now.

Finally getting back into space?

Sh*t, I just realized I'm going to have to fight the drek now... I really do need to get SK's new heavy into the series.

oh boy, this will be fun... just remember the cockpit on top is just for show XD (im not kidding, it's of sentimental value only)

EDIT: Also, who's gonna be piloting the Drek? I want to tell them how to use it

Finally getting back into space?

I have a reason now... I'm going to be my own party. I'm not picking a side.

Usually it's just me fighting me, which does save quite a bit of time and allows for me to record everything how I like it. But if someone has the video-making skill then I'm happy for them to step up as GMI commander for the battles in which I want them.

EDIT: Maybe I'll get Suestra to do it, but he is a pretty busy guy. However it would certainly put a nostalgic spin on things.

Edited October 15, 2014 by HatBat

Usually it's just me fighting me, which does save quite a bit of time and allows for me to record everything how I like it. But if someone has the video-making skill then I'm happy for them to step up as GMI commander for the battles in which I want them.

oh ok, I was just wondering cause MacyDean would get another person to play as the other side, but if you're fighting both sides i've already sent u instructions. Cool. Can't wait till season 2

I would like to create a third party. The "Union of Arcadian Socialist Republics" Will consist of me at the moment. We're a neutral wing and will not back down from threats from either side. Also HatBat I could probably record for my "wing".
